DATA: lo_nd_v TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node,
element = wd_this->mo_listener->f4_context_element " Web Dynpro: Interface for Node Element
delegate_to_original = abap_false " Forward to original of the context element
force_entry = abap_true " Also write the entry if values are identical
DATA l_server_event TYPE REF TO cl_wdr_server_event .
DATA l_view TYPE REF TO cl_wdr_delegating_view.

DATA: lo_popup TYPE REF TO if_wd_window.
